TERMS AND CONDITION

On Payments
 When paying via bank transfer or quickteller, please include your booking id or name in the reference. If you don't get a payment confirmation message at least 5 hours after payment, please call our support line (+2347008808800) or email us at reservations@hotels.ng

Check-in
 Standard check-in time is 12pm - 6pm. Please inform hotels.ng if you'll be checking in later than 5pm to ensure your reservation is not cancelled by the hotel.

Refunds & Cancellation
 Hotels are settled 24- 48 hours before your check in date. Please endeavour to call or email to cancel before this time. Refunds on cancellations after hotel has been paid may take 3 working days or longer depending on the hotel's policy. Refunds cannot be made on any reservations made on a non-refundable room rate.

Reservation & Best Price Guarantee
 Prices on the website are discounted especially for prepaid reservations. Some hotels may charge a higher rate at the hotel if you choose to pay on arrival. Once you place a booking and your reservation is secured, we'll send you a final confirmation on check-in date. However, the hotel reserves the right to cancel your reservation.
